game.title: The Witcher: Monster Slayer edition
game.synopsis: Geralt of Rivia is the professional monster slayer for hire, and monster type classifications and associated abilities are at the heart of your game experience. Build a library of over a dozen distinct weapons and skills to suit your playstyle. Geralt is a witcher, and witchers are the only race that can transform into monsters. While you're not looking, it is now, as it has always been and will always be. Your story begins on a snowy night in a remote town in the kingdom of Temeria.

beginning.context: Geralt is a witcher in the kingdom of Temeria.
beginning.location: While traveling in the kingdom with his associate, Vesemir
beginning.event: He is informed that a child is missing and requires his services.

ending.action: Geralt takes the child into his care
ending.destination: Then returns to the city of Orzammar
